Install factory_girl_rails

Update file Gemfile

Add 

   gem 'factory_girl_rails'

Becomes 

 group :development, :test do
   gem 'rspec-rails'
   gem 'capybara-webkit'
   gem 'factory_girl_rails'
 end
 
 # Use ActiveModel has_secure_password

Update file Gemfile.lock

Add 

     factory_girl (4.2.0)
       activesupport (>= 3.0.0)
     factory_girl_rails (4.2.1)
       factory_girl (~> 4.2.0)
       railties (>= 3.0.0)

Add 

   factory_girl_rails

Becomes
